content: repeat from * to end 6 sts round 16 cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts but do not close weave in ends if necessary inside nut stuff then pull to close p 03 blue sky fibers step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang special methods 3-stitch purl i-cord p3 do not turn slide 3 sts to other end of needle row 1 rs repeat row 1 until i-cord is desired length abbreviations co cast on p purl decrease decrease p2tog purl 2 stitches together dpns double pointed needles rem remaining k knit repeat repeat k2tog knit 2 stitches together rli right lifted increase insert the kfb knit into the front and back of right needle into the stitch one stitch row below the next stitch on the left needle place this stitch lli left lifted increase insert the onto the left needle and knit left needle into the stitch two row below the last stitch on the round s round s right needle from back to front st s stitch es knit through the back loop * repeat the directions between ndl s needle s the asterisks as many times as indicated p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2023 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 08012023 p 05
